ticket.title: run scaffold report error.
ticket.original-body:
Rails 3.0.5 ruby 1.9.2p180 (2011-02-18) [i386-mingw32]
when I run "rails generate scaffold Course name:string",cmd report @@@ javascript
error: F:\Ruby192\bin\ptest>rails generate scaffold Course name:string invoke active_record f:/Ruby192/lib/ruby/1.9.1/psych.rb:148:in `parse': couldn't parse YAML at line 9 column 2 (Psych::SyntaxError) from f:/Ruby192/lib/ruby/1.9.1/psych.rb:148:in `parse_stream' from f:/Ruby192/lib/ruby/1.9.1/psych.rb:119:in `parse' from f:/Ruby192/lib/ruby/1.9.1/psych.rb:106:in `load' from f:/Ruby192/lib/ruby/gems/1.9.1/gems/thor-0.14.6/lib/thor/invocation .rb:124:in `invoke_all' from f:/Ruby192/lib/ruby/gems/1.9.1/gems/thor-0.14.6/lib/thor/group.rb:2 26:in `dispatch' from support/dependencies.rb:225:in `load_dependency' from f:/Ruby192/lib/ruby/gems/1.9.1/gems/activesupport-3.0.5/lib/active_ support/dependencies.rb:239:in `require' from f:/Ruby192/lib/ruby/gems/1.9.1/gems/railties-3.0.5/lib/rails/comman ds.rb:17:in `<top (required)>' from script/rails:6:in `require' from script/rails:6:in `<main>'
@@@
Why it happened ? help! Thanks!
